references.paper_title: Feature representation learning for unsupervised cross-domain image retrieval
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it focuses on unsupervised cross-domain image retrieval, a key area addressed in the current work.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised feature representation learning for domain-generalized cross-domain image retrieval
references.reason: This paper extends the previous work on unsupervised CDR to handle domain generalization, a challenge also tackled in this research.

references.paper_title: A simple framework for contrastive learning of visual representations
references.reason: This foundational paper in contrastive learning provides the theoretical basis and practical algorithm used in the proposed two-stage framework.

references.paper_title: Momentum contrast for unsupervised visual representation learning
references.reason: This is a significant contribution to self-supervised learning, proposing an approach that is closely related to the method implemented here.
This paper directly addresses the cross-domain pre-training challenge, a crucial aspect of the presented approach, showing prior work on this technique.
